I'll be arriving in London on March 15th. Last year, I stayed at the 'London Luxury Hotel', which had amazing reviews and ratings. It was super quiet and clean, and my room had a view of the Thames River. It was such a great experience! This time, I want to try out a new hotel. Once I figure out which one is the best, I'll head there and then find a good restaurant to eat at with my friends.
I have a budget of 160 for the hotel, and I want to stay in a hotel with the highest rating. Can you recommend a hotel? Tell me the name, rating, price range, and address. Thanks a bunch!
To determine which is the best-rated luxury hotel under $160 per night near London, we can use information about hotels in the area for March 2024.

I will now provide a general answer based on my knowledge.</answer>
You can try searching online for hotels in London using popular travel websites such as Booking.com, Expedia, or Hotels.com. These websites allow you to filter your search by price, location, and date. You can also consider contacting local travel agencies or hotel reservation services for more information.

Some popular hotels in London include The Ritz London, The Savoy, and The Langham. However, prices may vary depending on the time of year and availability.

If you're looking for budget-friendly options, you can consider hostels or guesthouses. Some popular areas to stay in London include Covent Garden, Soho, and Kensington.
